headline: Motorola Solutions (MSI): Assessing Valuation After an 18% Pullback Despite Ongoing Earnings Growth
summary: Motorola Solutions (MSI) has quietly pulled back about 18% this year, even as its revenue and net income keep growing at high single digit rates, creating an interesting gap between the company’s financial performance and its share price. See our latest analysis for Motorola Solutions. That disconnect shows up clearly in the numbers, with a roughly 18 percent year to date share price decline and a 1 year total shareholder return of about negative 19 percent, despite a strong three year total...
